data.title: Realterm on LinkedIn: Realterm continues European expansion with acquisition of IOS facility in…
data.meta_description: Realterm announced today the acquisition of Pieter Hoebeeweg 99, an industrial outdoor storage (IOS) facility with 3,906 square meters of built area on a…
data.text:
We are thrilled to announce that Jennifer Allen, Assistant Property Manager, has been chosen as the first Canadian recipient of the J. Michael Coleman Scholarship! The mission of the J. Michael Coleman Scholarship fund is to support young and emerging professionals in their careers and in their involvement in BOMA. Congratulations to Jennifer on this outstanding recognition! https://lnkd.in/ekTEF3j #BOMA2024 #BOMAInternational BOMA International

Realterm today announced the acquisition of Schutweg 1, an industrial outdoor storage (IOS) facility with 700 square meters of built area on a 10,800-square-meter site in Waalwijk, Netherlands. The property is fully leased to Arriva, a leading European transport partner operating in 10 countries across the United Kingdom and Europe. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/eGE5cvZ2 Balazs Lados MRICS, Marieke de Jong, Jon Chalkley, Piet van de Ven, Robin van der Sluis #logisticsrealestate #transportation #logistics #investments #IOS

Realterm today announced the acquisition of a well-located and functional industrial outdoor storage (IOS) maintenance facility at 400-500 Corporate Court in Valley Cottage, NY. The 37,560-square-foot facility, situated on 5.4 acres, will serve as a key asset in Realterm’s expanding New York Metropolitan region portfolio. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/eieA6RCK Ed Brickley, Glenn High, Nick Dupuis, Ben Andreycak, Katie Legue, Colin O'Brien, Derek Fish #logisticsrealestate #ios #transportation #industrialCRE

Check out the before and after of our newly developed state-of-the-art IOS facility in the Netherlands. This modern truck parking facility is available for lease and is designed to meet the growing demands of the transportation industry, offering approximately 100 truck parking spaces, new pavement, new sustainable fencing & architectural gates among other impressive features. For more details, contact Robin van der Sluis and visit: https://lnkd.in/emStTXqB #ios #logisticsrealestate #transportation #industrialCRE

Today, on National Logistics Day, we celebrate the incredible logistics industry that makes our daily lives a little easier. From packaging to warehousing to delivering right to our home or office front doors, logistics professionals work tirelessly behind the scenes to provide us with the products we need. As a company that owns and manages transportation real estate and infrastructure assets across the world, Realterm is proud to play an essential role in the logistics industry. Join us in taking a moment to appreciate and thank all those who keep our world moving. www.realterm.com ##NationalLogisticsDay #logistics #supplychain #logisticsrealestate #transportation

Our team transformed a former Heineken building in Amsterdam into a multi-split property and completed a full renovation. We are pleased to welcome our new tenants Swapfiets, De Prefabriek, and G4S into our building! Alberto Radice Fossati, Paul Underwood, Leonie Kierkels MSC MRICS, Shankar Narain, Amanda Battist, MBA, CPA, CA, Johan Iemhoff, Milan Rama CA(SA), Balazs Lados MRICS, Robin van der Sluis #logisticsrealestate #industrialrealestate #renovation #transportation

Realterm announced today the acquisition of 805 140th Avenue Court E, an industrial outdoor storage (IOS) maintenance facility sitting on 4.3 acres in Sumner, Washington. The 18,800-square foot property located in the Kent Valley features a 12,700-square-foot maintenance shop and 6,100 square feet of office space. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/gsVNmyzA Ed Brickley, Derek Fish, Ben Andreycak, Marc Vonderweidt, Jack Falk #IOS #logisticsrealestate #transportation #industrialrealestate

From beach cleanup days in Amsterdam to Global Recycling days in our North American offices, our teammates spent the first half of 2024 working to make an impact in the communities we operate. As a global corporate citizen, we strive to be socially responsible and make a positive impact in the communities we serve. Learn more about the corporate giving activities our team has been involved in this year: https://lnkd.in/eGjECivh Lulu Hickey, Kelly Johnson, MPA, MealsOnWheels, Brightview Senior Living, Duurzaam Bedrijfsuitje #RealtermGivesBack #corporategiving #givingback #community #socialresponsibility #corporatecitizenship
